stories.text: What is this place. How did I come here?
It is just like comic books. I think I am teleported to some other dimension or maybe some other world. I don’t know what I am saying
Aedan, keep your calm don't freak out. Let's explore a bit
What is this thing?
It looks like a bot. There is a console attached to it. Let’s press this button and see what happens.
Hello, I am Bit bot. Welcome to the Bit prison.
Bit prison! Is this place a prison?
Yes it is a computer program to hold inmates. It is designed so that we don’t have to waste actual space to hold prisoners. Each inmate’s life form is a sequence of bits here.
Who are you then?
I was a tour guide for officials here. A recently upgraded bot has made me useless and so I was left in the open.
Do you know a way out of this place?
Yes but it is heavily secured. You can’t make it on your own.
I will never get out of here.
You can if I reprogram you with some higher instincts.
Why are you helping me?
I am just returning the favor. And as I am abandoned I don’t have any master.
Now you have enhanced reflexes and abilities such as jumping high.
What are these?
These are Chargers. They can corrupt your bit sequence if you touch them. In short, stay away from them else you will die!
What is this? It looks like a weapon.
It is a bit revolver used by prison guards.
Lookout prison guards have spotted us.
Who were those?
Those were special prison guards. They are more experienced and dangerous.
Maybe I can use their guns.
Let’s try to reprogram this weapon.
It is the strongest weapon used in this prison.
